Table1.News title: CA Relief Grant now accepting applications
Table1.News content: The second round of this grant provides cash payments to small businesses or small nonprofits operating in California. You must apply before February 8th.

Table1.News title: Sign up for COVID-19 vaccine notifications
Table1.News content: Get notified when it’s your turn to get the COVID-19 vaccine at myturn.ca.gov. If you’re in Los Angeles or San Diego and are eligible now, you can also schedule your appointment.

Table1.News title: Regional Stay Home Order ends as ICU projections improve
Table1.News content: The CA Department of Public Health is ending the Regional Stay Home Order across California. This action comes as projected ICU availability rose above 15%. Counties will return to their assigned Blueprint tiers.
Table1.Link text: See what can open near you
